title: Mopeka partners with Victron Energy - LP Gas - LP Gas magazine
summary: Mopeka and Victron Energy have partnered to integrate Mopeka's wireless water and propane tank monitoring sensors with Victron's Venus OS. This allows users to monitor their water and propane usage within the GX environment using their GX device or remotely. The Mopeka Pro Check family of sonar sensors uses BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) to stream liquid level, temperature and sensor battery voltage wirelessly to the GX device.
product_or_process: Mopeka Pro Check family of sonar sensors
greenwashing: This article does not provide any evidence of greenwashing.

title: NextEra Energy is once again recognized as No. 1 in its industry on Fortune's list of 'World's Most Admired Companies' - PR Newswire
summary: NextEra Energy, the parent company of Florida Power & Light, has been ranked number one in the electric and gas utilities industry on Fortune's 2023 list of "World's Most Admired Companies". NextEra Energy has invested heavily in clean energy infrastructure, and its subsidiary, NextEra Energy Resources, is the world's largest generator of renewable energy from wind and solar. NextEra Energy is committed to providing clean, low-cost energy to its customers and has set an ambitious goal of eliminating carbon emissions from its operations by no later than 2045.
green_innovation: TRUE. NextEra Energy is a leader in the development and deployment of renewable energy technologies, including wind, solar, and battery storage. The company's commitment to clean energy innovation is evident in its investments in research and development, as well as its partnerships with other organizations to advance renewable energy technologies.
business_innovation: TRUE. NextEra Energy is constantly innovating to improve its business processes and deliver value to its customers. For example, the company has developed a number of innovative programs to help customers reduce their energy consumption and save money on their energy bills.
green_product: TRUE. NextEra Energy offers a number of green products to its customers, including renewable energy plans, energy efficiency programs, and electric vehicle charging stations. These products help customers reduce their environmental impact and save money on their energy bills.
green_process: TRUE. NextEra Energy has implemented a number of green processes to reduce its environmental impact, including using renewable energy sources to power its operations, recycling and composting waste, and using energy-efficient technologies. These processes help the company reduce its greenhouse gas emissions and protect the environment.
greenwashing: FALSE. NextEra Energy's commitment to clean energy is genuine and the company has a long track record of investing in renewable energy and other sustainability initiatives.

title: Masdar Makes Strategic Investment in One of the World's Largest Geothermal Players, Growing Clean Energy Portfolio ... - PR Newswire
summary: Masdar, a global clean energy company, is investing in Pertamina Geothermal Energy (PGE), one of the world's largest geothermal players, marking Masdar's entry into the geothermal energy sector. The investment gives Masdar access to the second-largest geothermal market in the world and will help Indonesia achieve its goal of increasing its installed geothermal capacity from 2.8 gigawatts (GW) in 2022 to 6.2 GW by 2030.

title: Highland Electric Fleets Appoints Brian Buccella as Chief Commercial Officer, Elevating its Bench of Mobility and ... - PR Newswire
summary: Former Bird and Segway executive Brian Buccella joins Highland Electric Fleets as its new Chief Commercial Officer to oversee the company's efforts to help school districts, municipalities, and other fleet managers across the U.S. upgrade their diesel school bus fleets to electric. Buccella has over 20 years of experience in the mobility space, including roles at Bird and Segway, where he was responsible for developing strategic partnerships and driving business development initiatives for electric micromobility and electric vehicle products.

green_product: TRUE, Highland's electric school buses are designed to reduce negative environmental externalities by eliminating tailpipe emissions and reducing air pollution.
green_process: TRUE, Highland's vehicle-to-grid (V2G) program uses electric school buses to store and discharge energy back to the grid, which helps to balance the grid and reduce the need for fossil fuel-powered generation.

title: KOHLER HERITAGE COLORS REVEALS ITS TWO TOP SHADES AT KBIS 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. announced the results of the Kohler Heritage Colors voting campaign at the Kitchen & Bath Industry Show 2023 in Las Vegas. The two shades – Spring Green and Peachblow – were selected from Heritage Colors' original six shade palette and will be offered exclusively in limited quantities starting in Summer 2023. The exclusive product designs include toilets, lavatories, bathtubs, sinks, and a vessel.

summary: - The Indian solar power industry has grown significantly in recent years, driven by government initiatives to promote renewable energy.   - Several Indian companies have emerged as key players in the solar power generation sector, including Adani Green Energy, Tata Power Solar Systems, ReNew Power, Hero Future Energies, and Azure Power.   - These companies are involved in various aspects of the industry, including manufacturing, project development, engineering, procurement, construction (EPC), and operation and maintenance services.
